main_definition: A label or small piece of paper, plastic, or other material attached to an object or person to identify it or mark it in some way.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To follow someone on a social media platform
meanings_and_examples.example: I decided to tag you in the photo so everyone can see.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A small piece of paper, plastic, or other material attached to an object or person for identification or marking purposes.
meanings_and_examples.example: The librarian used a tag with her name on it when she checked out books.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To associate oneself with a particular group, idea, or concept
meanings_and_examples.example: She chose to tag herself in the post as an advocate for animal rights.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A symbol used to identify objects and their attributes on maps or blueprints
meanings_and_examples.example: The architect included a tag next to each building design with its dimensions.
